languages.text: {n}Пленник дергается, словно пытается указать на вас связанными руками.{/n} "Ты — ложновер{mf|ец|ка}, фальшивый капитан! Ты ведешь людей во тьму еретическую, прочь от спасения!"
{n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"
languages.original_text: {n}Пленник дергается, словно пытается указать на вас связанными руками.{/n} "Ты — ложновер{mf|ец|ка}, фальшивый капитан! Ты ведешь людей во тьму еретическую, прочь от спасения!"

languages.text: {n}El prisionero se revuelve como si intentara señalarte con sus manos atadas.{/n} «Eres un{mf||a} fals{mf|o|a} creyente, ¡un fals{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán! ¡Conduces a la gente a la herejía, no a la salvación!».
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El prisionero se revuelve como si intentara señalarte con sus manos atadas.{/n} «Eres un{mf||a} fals{mf|o|a} creyente, ¡un fals{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán! ¡Conduces a la gente a la herejía, no a la salvación!».

languages.text: {n}囚人は縛られた手で、こちらを指さそうとするかのようにモゾモゾする。{/n}「お前は偽の信者、フェイク・キャプテンだ！お前は皆を異端の暗闇に導いて、救いから遠ざけている！」
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人は縛られた手で、こちらを指さそうとするかのようにモゾモゾする。{/n}「お前は偽の信者、フェイク・キャプテンだ！お前は皆を異端の暗闇に導いて、救いから遠ざけている！」

languages.text: {n}犯人抽搐了一下，似乎打算用被绑住的双手指控你。{/n}“你是虚假的信徒，是虚假的舰长！你把那些人带入异端的黑暗之中，远离救赎的明光！”
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}犯人抽搐了一下，似乎打算用被绑住的双手指控你。{/n}“你是虚假的信徒，是虚假的舰长！你把那些人带入异端的黑暗之中，远离救赎的明光！”

languages.text: {n}Der Gefangene zuckt kurz, als würde er versuchen, mit seinen gefesselten Händen auf dich zu zeigen.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein falscher Gläubiger|eine falsche Gläubige}, ein falscher Captain! Ihr führt Eure Untergebenen in die Düsternis der Ketzerei, weg von der Erlösung!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gefangene zuckt kurz, als würde er versuchen, mit seinen gefesselten Händen auf dich zu zeigen.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein falscher Gläubiger|eine falsche Gläubige}, ein falscher Captain! Ihr führt Eure Untergebenen in die Düsternis der Ketzerei, weg von der Erlösung!"

languages.text: {n}Le prisonnier esquisse un geste brusque, comme s'il tentait de vous pointer du doigt malgré ses mains attachées.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un faux croyant|une fausse croyante}, {mf|un|une} capitaine fantoche ! Vous éloignez vos gens du droit chemin de la rédemption et vous les condamnez ce faisant aux ténèbres de l'hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prisonnier esquisse un geste brusque, comme s'il tentait de vous pointer du doigt malgré ses mains attachées.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un faux croyant|une fausse croyante}, {mf|un|une} capitaine fantoche ! Vous éloignez vos gens du droit chemin de la rédemption et vous les condamnez ce faisant aux ténèbres de l'hérésie ! »

languages.text: {n}Mahkûm, bağlı elleriyle seni işaret etmeye çalışırken titriyor.{/n} "İnancın aykırılıktan, kaptanlığın uydurmadan ibaret! İnsanları kurtuluştan öteye, kâfirliğin karanlığına sürüklüyorsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner jerks as if trying to point at you with his tied hands.{/n} "You're a false believer, a fake captain! You're leading people into the gloom of heresy, away from salvation!"
